description: Combat Action: uses Albedo's Elemental Skill.
While equipped, if the summon is on the field, then your characters' Plunging Attack deals +1 DMG.
Combat Action: uses Alhaitham's Elemental Burst.
If his burst consumes a Chisel-Light Mirror (infusion) with at least 1 Duration, then always attach Chisel-Light Mirror with 3 Duration and draw 1 card.
Combat Action: uses Amber's Elemental Skill.
After you use a Normal Attack while Baron Bunny (summon) is on the field, it explodes and deals 4 Pyro DMG.
Ayaka's Cryo Infusion causes her to deal +1 Cryo DMG.
When you switch to Ayaka: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
Combat Action: uses Ayato's Elemental Skill.
Ayato's infused attacks deal +1 DMG if the target's remaining HP is 6 or less.
Combat Action: Attach Stone Facets: Elemental Crystallization to Azhdaha, then create 1 Elemental Die for each Elemental Type your characters have.
Combat Action: uses Baizhu's Elemental Burst.
While equipped, when Seamless Shield (burst) activates a healing effect, generate 1 Elemental Dice of the same type as your active character.
Combat Action: uses Barbara's Elemental Skill.
While equipped, and her summon is active, spend 1 less Elemental Die the next time you Switch Character.(Once per round)
Combat Action: uses Beidou's Elemental Skill.
After completing her prepare skill, Beidou's Normal Attacks this Round will cost 1 less Unaligned Element. (Can be triggered 2 times)
Combat Action: uses Bennett's Elemental Burst.
When Bennett uses his burst, its DMG Bonus is now always active and will no longer have an HP restriction.
Combat Action: uses Candace's Elemental Burst.
While equipped, her burst has the following extra effect: After your character uses a Normal Attack: Deals 1 Hydro DMG. (Once per Round)
Combat Action: uses Chongyun's Elemental Skill.
When he creates Chonghua Frost Field, it will have the following effects: Your Sword, Claymore, and Polearm-wielding characters' Normal Attacks deal +1 DMG.
Combat Action: uses Collei's Elemental Skill.
After Collei uses her skill, during this Round, when your characters' Skills trigger Dendro-Related Reactions: Deal 1 Dendro DMG. (Once per Round)
Combat Action: uses Cryo Cicin Mage's Elemental Skill.
After Cryo Cicin Mage uses a skill: If Cryo Cicins' Usages exceeds their limit (3), deal 2 Cryo DMG.
Can only be played if your active character is Cryo Hypostasis: Attach Cryo Crystal Core (revive) to them.
After Cryo Hypostasis triggers Cryo Crystal Core: Attach Sheer Cold to the opposing active character.
Combat Action: uses Cyno's Elemental Skill.
When he uses his Elemental Skill with an even number of Pactsworn Pathclearer stacks, deal +1 DMG.
Combat Action: uses Dehya's Elemental Skill.
End Phase: If Dehya has 6 or less HP, heal for 2 HP.
Combat Action: uses Diluc's Elemental Skill.
When Diluc uses his Elemental Skill the second time in one Round, spend 1 less Pyro Die.
Combat Action: uses Diona's Elemental Skill.
When she uses her Elemental Skill, its Shield points +1.
Combat Action: uses Dori's Elemental Burst.

While equipped, the summon from her Elemental Burst heals 1 more HP when healing characters with 6 or less HP, and increases the amount of Energy gained by characters with no Energy by 1 when Energy is gained.
Combat Action: uses Dvalin's Elemental Skill.
When Total Collapse attached to opposing active character is removed: Apply Total Collapse to the next opposing standby character. (Once per Round)
Combat Action: heal that character for 3 HP and attach the Electro Crystal Core (revive) to them.
Combat Action: uses Eula's Elemental Burst.
When Eula uses her Elemental Skill, this will generate 1 more stack for Lightfall Sword (burst).
Combat Action: uses Fischl's Elemental Skill.
When she uses her Elemental Skill, after Fischl uses a Normal Attack: Deal 2 Electro DMG and consume 1 usage.
Combat Action: uses Ganyu's 5 cost Normal Attack.
If she has used this attack before during this match, the Piercing DMG dealt to all opposing characters on standby is increased to 3.
Combat Action: uses Gorou's Elemental Skill.
While equipped, after any of your characters deals Geo DMG: If General's War Banner is in play, draw 1 card. (Once per Round)
Combat Action: uses Hu Tao's Elemental Skill.
When Hu Tao has 6 or less HP, she deals +1 Pyro DMG.
Combat Action: uses Itto's Normal Attack.
After Itto uses his Normal Attack for the second time or more in one Round: If Superlative Superstrength is triggered, deal +1 additional DMG.
Combat Action: uses Jean's Elemental Burst.
While equipped, the summon from her burst causes you to deal +1 Anemo DMG.
Combat Action: uses Kaeya's Elemental Skill.
When he uses his Elemental Skill, he heals himself for 2 HP. (Once per Round)
Combat Action: uses Kazuha's Elemental Skill.
When Kazuha triggers a swirl: For the next 2 instances, your Characters and Summons will deal +1 DMG for the Elemental Type Swirled. (Each Elemental Type is counted independently)
Combat Action: Uses Keqing's Elemental Skill.
When she creates an Electro Infusion, it will have the following effects: Starting Duration +1, +1 Electro DMG.
Combat Action: uses Klee's Elemental Skill.
When Klee creates Explosive Spark, its Usages +1.
Combat Action: uses Kokomi's Elemental Burst.
When Kokomi uses her burst, summons a Bake-Kurage with 1 Usage, or if Bake-Kurage is already on the field increase Usages by 1.
While her burst is active, Bake-Kurage deals +1 DMG.
Combat Action: uses Kujou Sara's Elemental Skill.
While equipped, allied Electro characters with Crowfeather Cover will deal +1 additional Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG.
Combat Action: uses Stonehide Lawachurl's Elemental Burst.
When Stonehide Lawachurl defeats an opposing character: re-attach Stonehide (DMG reduction) and Stone Force (DMG bonus).
Combat Action: uses Layla's Elemental Skill.
While equipped, every time Shooting Star deals DMG, draw 1 card.
After you switch to Lisa: Attach Conductive to the opposing active character. (Once per Round)
Combat Action: uses Lynette's Elemental Skill.
When Lynette uses her Elemental Skill for the second time this Round: deals +2 DMG and forces your opponent to switch to their previous character.
Combat Action: uses Lyney's Prop Arrow Normal Attack.
While equipped, the damage dealt by Lyney and your Grin-Malkin Hat will deal +2 DMG to characters affected by Pyro. (Once per Round)
Combat Action: uses Maguu Kenki's Anemo Elemental Skill.
When Maguu Kenki uses the Anemo skill, switch to your next character.
When Maguu Kenki uses the Cryo skill, switch to the previous character.
Combat Action: uses Mirror Maiden's Elemental Skill.
When she creates a Refraction, it will have the following effects: Starting Duration +1, will increase the Cost of switching off the debuffed character by 1.
Combat Action: uses Mona's Elemental Burst.
When Mona is the active character, Hydro-Related Reactions you trigger deal +2 additional DMG.
Combat Action: uses Nahida's Elemental Burst.
While equipped, the following effects will take place based on your party's Elemental Types.
Pyro: while the burst is active, converts Piercing DMG from her skill into Dendro DMG.
Electro: when the burst enters the field, increases existing Seed of Skandha usages by 1.
Hydro: when the burst enters the field, increases it's Duration by +1 Rounds.
Combat Action: uses Nilou's Elemental Skill.
While equipped, the damage dealt by your Bountiful Core is increased by 1.
Combat Action: uses Ningguang's Elemental Skill.
While equipped, Jade Screen will cause you to deal +1 Geo DMG.
Combat Action: uses Noelle's Elemental Skill.
After Noelle uses a Normal Attack: if Full Plate is active, heal all your characters for 1 HP. (Once per Round)
Combat Action: uses Rhodeia's Elemental Burst.
When she uses her Elemental Burst, all summons gain +1 usage.
Combat Action: uses Pyro Agent's Elemental Skill.
When Pyro Agent creates Stealth, it will have the following effects: Starting usages +1, the Physical DMG thehe deals will be converted to Pyro DMG.
If Abyss Lector: Fathomless Flames has already triggered Fiery Rebirth (revive), or the next time it is triggered: discard this card and apply 3 Shield Points.
While the shield is active, Abyss Lector deals +1 Pyro DMG.
Combat Action: uses Scorching Loremaster's Elemental Burst.
The summon created by the Elemental Burst will deal +1 DMG in Rounds when Eremite Scorching Loremaster has used a Normal Attack or Elemental Skill.
The summon's DMG reduction effect can now be triggered twice per Round.
Combat Action: uses Qiqi's Elemental Burst.
While equipped, when Qiqi uses her burst, she revives all your fallen characters and heals them for 2 HP. (Can happen 2 times per match)
Combat Action: uses Raiden Shogun's Elemental Burst.
Her burst deals +1 additional DMG for every point of Resolve consumed.
Combat Action: uses Razor's Elemental Skill.
When he uses his Elemental Skill, one of your Electro characters gains 1 Energy. (Once per Round, active character prioritized)
Combat Action: uses Sayu's Elemental Skill.
When Sayu is the active character, draw 2 cards when you trigger a Swirl reaction. (Once per Round)

Can only be played if your active character is Millennial Pearl Seahorse: When played, Millennial Pearl Seahorse will have Fontemer Pearl (barrier) with 1 Usage attached to them. If they already have Fontemer Pearl attached, Usages +1 instead.
When the Fontemer Pearl attached to Millennial Pearl Seahorse negates DMG from Summons, change to Usages not being consumed twice per Round.
Combat Action: uses Shenhe's Elemental Skill.
While equipped, when the Icy Quill (elemental skill) is triggered by your characters' Normal Attacks, its Usages will not decrease. (Once per Round)
Can only be played if your active character is La Signora: When played, generate 3 Elemental Dice of the same Type as La Signora.
When this character takes at least 3 DMG: Negate 1 DMG, then apply Sheer Cold or Blazing Heat to the opposing active character based on La Signora's state. (Once per Round)
Combat Action: uses Sucrose's Elemental Burst.
When she creates the Large Wind Spirit (summon), after it converts to another Elemental Type: Deal +1 DMG of this Elemental Type.
Combat Action: uses Tartaglia's Elemental Skill.
End Phase: While equipped, deal 1 Piercing DMG to the opponent's active character if they have Riptide attached.
Combat Action: uses Jadeplume Terrorshroom's Elemental Skill.
Jadeplume Terrorshroom can accumulate 1 more stack of Radical Vitality.
Combat Action: uses Thoma's Elemental Burst.
While equipped, Thoma's Elemental Burst starting Usages +1
Combat Action: uses Thunder Manifestation's Elemental Skill.
While equipped, when an opponent with Lightning Rod attached takes DMG: You draw 1 card. (Once per Round)
Combat Action: uses Tighnari's Elemental Skill.
While Tighnari is infused by the Elemental Skill, his Charged Attack costs 1 less Unaligned Element.
Combat Action: uses Venti's Elemental Skill.
While equipped, after Stormzone is triggered, the next Normal Attack performed by your character in this Round will cost 1 less Unaligned Element.
Combat Action: uses Wanderer's Elemental Skill.
While equipped, after Wanderer is in Windfavored state and after using a Charged Attack: spend 1 less Elemental Die the next time you switch characters and deal 1 Anemo DMG.
Combat Action: uses Xiangling's Elemental Skill.
When she uses her Elemental Skill, she will also deal 1 Pyro DMG.
Combat Action: uses Xiao's Elemental Burst.
While Xiao's burst is active, his Elemental Skill will cost 1 less Anemo Die. (Every use of his burst allows the effect to be triggered twice)
Combat Action: uses Xingqiu's Elemental Skill.
While equipped, Rain Swords can block DMG of 2 or more, and starting usages +1.
Combat Action: uses Yae Miko's Elemental Burst.
When Yae bursts and destroys a Sesshou Sakura (summon), the next use of her Elemental Skill this Round will cost 2 less Elemental Dice.
Combat Action: uses Yanfei's Normal Attack.
When Yanfei uses a Charged Attack: Deal +1 DMG to enemies with 6 or less HP If Scarlet Seal is triggered, then draw 1 card.
Combat Action: uses Yaoyao's Elemental Skill.
When the summon created from her Elemental Skill has only 1 Usage remaining, it deals +1 DMG and healing is increased by 1.
Combat Action: uses Yelan's Elemental Skill.
Roll Phase: 1 Elemental Dice will be rolled as Omni Element for each Elemental Type in your party. (Max 3)
Combat Action: uses Yoimiya's Elemental Skill.
When Yoimiya uses her Elemental Skill, gain +1 initial usages.
Combat Action: uses Zhongli's 5 cost Elemental Skill.
While equipped, when your active character is protected by a Shield, your Summons deal +1 Geo DMG.
Combat Action: uses Charlotte's Elemental Skill.
While equipped, when any character uses a Normal Attack: If your opponent has a character with the debuff from her Elemental Skill, heal your active character for 2 HP. (Once per Round)
Combat Action: uses Neuvillette's Normal Attack.
After any character triggers a Hydro-Related Reaction, Neuvillette deals +1 DMG for the next 2 instances
Combat Action: uses Kirara's Elemental Skill.
Spend 1 less Elemental Die when switching from Kirara (Once per Round)
Combat Action: uses Electro Cicin Mage's Elemental Skill.
While equipped, before you choose an action: If Electro Cicin's usages is at least 3, then Electro Cicin immediately deals 1 Electro DMG. (consumes 1 usage, once per Round)

Usage(s): 3
This card will record the number of cards discarded from your Support Zone during this match as points. (Max 6 points)
After your characters use an Elemental Burst: If this card has recorded at least 5 points, discard this card and generate Omni Element equal to the number of points minus 2.
This card will record the number of types of Elemental DMG opposing characters have taken during this match as points. (Max 4 points)
End Phase: If you have 3 or more points, discard this card and draw cards equal to the amount of points.
When either side uses a Skill: If Elemental DMG was dealt, this card gains 1 point.
When this card gains 3 points, discard this card, then create 3 different Basic Elemental Dice.
When played: Draw 1 Food Event Card from your deck.
When you play a Food Event Card: Draw 1 Food Event Card from your deck. (Once per Round)

After you switch characters: The next Switch Character action you perform this Round will be considered a Fast Action instead of a Combat Action. It will also cost 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
After your character uses a skill: This card will accumulate 1 point.
When this card has stored 3 points, discard this card and draw 3 cards.
When you play an Equipment or Support Card with an original cost of 1 Elemental Die: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
Usage(s): 2
When you play a Weapon/ Artifact/ Location/ Companion card: If you have played a card with the same name previously during this match, spend 2 less Elemental Dice to play it. (Once per Round)
Usage(s): 2
After you play an Action Card: If, while this card is on the field, you have already played 3 Action Cards this Round, draw 1 card and create 1 Omni Die. (Once per Round)
Usage(s): 3
You must have a character who has already equipped a Weapon or Artifact: The next time you play a Weapon or Artifact card in this Round: Spend 2 less Elemental Dice.
Can only be played when you have 0 Elemental Dice left: Generate 2 different basic Elemental Dice.

Your active character must be one of the following elemental types to play this card: Cryo/Hydro/Pyro/Electro/Dendro: The element corresponding to your active character's Elemental Type will be applied to all your characters affected by elements.
In this Round, the next time an opposing character is defeated during your Action, you can continue to act again when that Action ends.
Draw a number of cards equal to the current Round number minus 1. (Up to 4 cards can be drawn in this way)
3 Event Cards played by your opponent in this Round will take no effect.

cards.display_name: Day of Resistance: Moment of Shattered Dreams
description: During this Round, your targeted character takes -1 DMG. (Max 4 times)
Create 1 Cryo Die.
During this Round, your current active character will deal +2 DMG for the next instance.
Create 1 Hydro Die.
Heal your active character for 2 HP and all your characters on standby for 1 HP.
Create 1 Pyro Die.
During this round, the next instance of Pyro-Related Reactions your current active character triggers deals +3 DMG.
Create 1 Electro Die.
One of your characters without maximum Energy gains 1 Energy. (Active Character prioritized)
Create 1 Anemo Die.
Switch to the target character and create Omni Element x1.
Create 1 Geo Die.
During this round, the next time your character deals Geo DMG: If you have a Shield Combat Status, add 3 Shield points.
Create 1 Dendro Die.
During this round, the next Elemental Reaction you trigger deals +2 DMG.
Your Burning Flame, Dendro Core, and Catalyzing Field gain +1 Usage(s).
During this round, after a character users a skill: Switch your next character to be the active character.
When the Action Phase of the next Round begins: Create 3 Omni Element and draw 1 card.
Convert all your Elemental Dice to Omni Element.
Draw 1 card. After that, switch any cards in your hand.
Convert the Elemental Dice spent to Omni Element x2.
The next time you Switch Character: Spend 1 less Elemental Die.
Select any Elemental Die to reroll. Can reroll 2 times.
Draw 2 cards.
Only playable if one of your characters is defeated this Round: Create 1 Omni and your current active character gains 1 Energy. (Only one copy of I Haven't Lost Yet! can be played each round.)
The next time you Switch Character: This switch will be considered a Fast Action instead of a Combat Action.
The next time you use a Skill: Switch your next character in to be the active character.
Your current Active Character gains 1 Energy.
Shift 1 Energy from at most 2 of your characters on standby to your active character.
Shift 1 Weapon Equipment Card that has been equipped to one of your characters to another one of your characters of the same Weapon Type, and reset 'per Round' effects.

cards.display_name: Blessing of the Divine Relic's Installation
description: Shift 1 Artifact Card that has been equipped to one of your characters to another one of your characters, and reset 'per Round' effects.
Choose one Summon on your side and grant it +1 Usage(s).
Choose one Summon on the opposing side and cause it to lose 2 Usage(s).
Destroy all Summons. (Affects both you and your opponent!)
Summon 1 Random Hilichurl Summon!
Deal 1 Cryo/Hydro/Pyro/Electro DMG at the End Phase, can be used 2 times.
Create 1 Fatui Ambusher of a random type on the opponent's field.
Deals 1 Cryo/Hydro/Pyro/Cryo DMG when triggered, 2 Usages.
Combat Action: Switch to the target character. That character then uses a Normal Attack.
During this round, your current active character's next Normal Attack deals +1 DMG.
When this Normal Attack is a Charged Attack: Deal +1 additional DMG.
Create 4 basic Elemental Dice of different types.
Players with less than 4 cards in their hand draw cards until their hand has 4 cards in it.
The next time you play a Weapon or Artifact card: Spend 1 less Elemental Die.
Return a Weapon card equipped by your character to your Hand.
During this Round, the next time you play a Weapon card: Spend 2 less Elemental Dice.

Can only be played when you have at least 8 Elemental Dice remaining, and your opponent has not yet ended their Round: After a player announces the end of their Round first, the other player, who has yet to announced the end of their Round, draws 2 cards.
Return an Artifact card equipped by your character to your Hand.
During this Round, the next time you play an Artifact card from your hand: Spend 2 less Elemental Dice.
Each time you discard an Equipment Card from one of your characters during this Round: Gain 1 Omni Element. (Max 2)
(This effect can be triggered by the loss of an Equipment Card from a character falling or from having their Weapon or Artifact replaced.)
Can only be played when you have at least 8 Elemental Dice remaining and your opponent has not ended their Round: In this Round, both sides must spend 1 extra Elemental Die when switching characters.
Attached Four-Leaf Sigil to target character: At the End Phase of Every Round, you will switch to this character.
Each time after your character is targeted by and takes DMG or is healed: Accumulate 1 point (Max 2 points).
When you play a Weapon or Artifact with an original cost of no more Dice than you have points: Clear all points and play that card for free.
Select a card from your Support Zone and discard it. After that, randomly generate 2 Support Cards in your hand.
During the Round, the next time you play a Support Card: Spend 1 less Elemental Die.
Can only be played when there is a total of at least 4 cards in your opponent's Support Zone and Summons Zone: All Summons on both sides lose 1 Usage.
During this Round, the target character's next Normal Attack deals +1 DMG.
During this Round, the target character's next Elemental Burst deals +3 DMG.
During this Round, the target character takes -3 DMG the next time.
During this Round, the target character's next Normal Attack costs 1 less Unaligned Element.
Heal the target character for 1 HP.
Heal the target character for 2 HP.
Heal the target character for 1 HP. For the next two Rounds, heal this character for 1 HP again at the End Phase.
Before this Round ends, the target character's Normal Attacks cost 1 less Unaligned Element.
Revives the target character and heals that character for 1 HP.
Before this Round ends, the target character's Normal Attacks deal +1 DMG.
During this Round, all your characters' next Elemental Skills deal +2 DMG.
During this Round, all your characters take -2 DMG the next time.
During this Round, all your characters will use 1 less Elemental Die when using their Skill next time.
Heal the target character for 2 HP. For the next 3 Rounds, heal this character for 1 HP again during the End Phase.
